system.effect: Increases Hull Integrity by twice the amount of power supplied (max +6 Hull, for 3 Power). If component is supplied less power or is damaged, bonus is lost, although cannot bring Hull Integrity below 0. Can increase Supplied power with +0 Tech-use check, unpowering other components at GM Discretion.
